meanings.definition: A person who adds their initials to something.
meanings.sent1: The initialer signed the document with their initials.
meanings.sent2: The initialer put their initials on the painting.
meanings.sent3: The initialer jokingly added their initials to the cake with icing.
meanings.sent4: The initialer's signature initials stood out on the contract.
meanings.sent5: The initialer's unique initials made their mark on the artwork.

meanings.definition: To mark or sign with initials.
meanings.sent1: She will initialer the form before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: Remember to initialer each page of the agreement.
meanings.sent3: He initialered the tree trunk with his initials as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The artist initialered their masterpiece with a hidden symbol.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to initialer their work for identification.
